title: Aathadi Manasudhan Lyrics Kazhugu Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Aathadi Manasudhan
Singers: Priya
Lyrics: Na.Muthkumar
Music:Â Yuvan
Movie: Kazhugu

Aathadi manasudhaan, Rekkakatti parakuthu
Aanalum vayasudhaan, Kitta vara thayanguthu
Akkam pakkam paathu paathu
Aasaiyaaga veesum kaathu
Nenjukulla yedho pesuthe
Adada indha manasudhan,
Suthi suthi unna theduthe
Azhaga indha kolusudhan
Thathi thathi un peyar solludhe (Aathadi manasudhaan ..)

Kitta vandhu neeyum pesum pothu
kitta thotta kannu verthu pogum, Muche kaichala maarum
Vittu vittu una paakum pothu
Vetti vetti minnal onnu mothum, manase maargazhi maasam

Arugil unthan paasam intha kaathil veesuthu
Vizhi theruvil paarkum unaai urava theduthu
paavi nenja ena senja, unthan pera solli konja
Enna konnaalum opaathu un pera solvenada

Onna renda enna naanum solla
oraayiram aasa vachen ulla, pesa dhairiyam illa
Ulla oru vartha vandhu thulla
Ullam enna mutti mutti thalla,irundhum vetkathil sella

Kaalam muludhum naalum, unna paarthe vazhanum
Uyir pogum neram undhan madiyil saaindhe aaganaum
Unna thavira enna venum, vera enna ketka thonum
Nenjam unnoda vazhaama mannodu saayaadhada .
